Starting as a local general practice, Franklin, Denney, Ward and Dryer Attorneys at Law, PLC now serves the Cities of Waynesboro, Staunton, Lexington, Harrisonburg and Charlottesville and the Counties of Augusta, Rockbridge, Rockingham, Nelson and Albermarle.

The Firm remains a vital and constant fixture in the City of Waynesboro. The integrity and work performance of the attorneys and staff is reflected by the large client base that continues to expand. We are committed in providing thorough, concise legal services to our clients at a fair cost.
